files.name: qti.xml
files.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<assessmentItem xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imsqti_v2p1"
                xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imsqti_v2p1 http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imsqti_v2p1.xsd"
                title="" adaptive="false" timeDependent="false">
                  <correctResponseFeedback>Correct!</correctResponseFeedback>
    <incorrectResponseFeedback>Your answer.</incorrectResponseFeedback>
    <responseDeclaration identifier="RESPONSE" cardinality="single" baseType="identifier">
        <correctResponse>
            <value>D</value>
        </correctResponse>
    </responseDeclaration>
    <outcomeDeclaration identifier="SCORE" cardinality="single" baseType="float"/>
    <itemBody>
        <choiceInteraction responseIdentifier="RESPONSE" maxChoices="1">
            <prompt>Which equation is NOT balanced?</prompt>
            <simpleChoice identifier="A" fixed="false">2H2 + O2 → 2H2O<feedbackInline identifier="A" defaultFeedback="true"></feedbackInline></simpleChoice>
            <simpleChoice identifier="B" fixed="false">4H2 + 2O2 → 4H2O<feedbackInline identifier="B" defaultFeedback="true"></feedbackInline></simpleChoice>
            <simpleChoice identifier="C" fixed="false">H2 + H2 + O2 → H2O + H2O<feedbackInline identifier="C" defaultFeedback="true"></feedbackInline></simpleChoice>
            <simpleChoice identifier="D" fixed="false">2H2 + O2 → H2O<feedbackInline identifier="D" defaultFeedback="true"></feedbackInline></simpleChoice>
        </choiceInteraction>
    </itemBody>
</assessmentItem>
